headline.main: Deng Xiaoping: A Political Wizard Who Put China on the Capitalist Road

abstract: Obituary of Deng Xiaoping, China's late paramount leader; Deng, like Mao Zedong and Chou Enlai, who preceeded him, was among small group of revolutionary elders who fought as guerrillas for Communist cause and then dominated leadership since 1949; photos (L)
snippet: Like Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai before him, Deng Xiaoping was among the small group of revolutionary elders who fought as guerrillas for the Communist cause and then dominated the leadership of the People's Republic they proclaimed on Oct. 1, 1949....
